name: Pull Workout
description: A workout focused on pulling movements targeting back and biceps.

exercises.name: Pull-Ups
exercises.description: Perform pull-ups to target the upper back and lats.

exercises.name: Bent Over Rows
exercises.description: Perform rows with a barbell or dumbbells to target the middle back.

exercises.name: Deadlifts
exercises.description: Perform deadlifts to target the lower back, hamstrings, and glutes.

exercises.name: Face Pulls
exercises.description: Use a cable machine to perform face pulls, targeting the rear deltoids.

exercises.name: Bicep Curls
exercises.description: Perform curls with a barbell or dumbbells to target the biceps.
